sys_update_xml.name: sp_rectangle_menu_item_864aed00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d475
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rectangle_menu_item"><sp_rectangle_menu_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><color/><condition>gs.isLoggedIn() && gs.getUser().hasRole('approver_user')</condition><display_1/><display_2/><display_date/><filter/><glyph/><hint>My Approvals</hint><kb_article/><kb_category/><kb_topic/><label>Approvals</label><order>400</order><record_script><![CDATA[// only show 30 in header menu dropdown
var max = 30;

var t = data;
t.items = [];
t.count = 0;

var u = getMyApprovals();

// use record watchers to tell header when to update dropdown counts
t.record_watchers = [];
t.record_watchers.push({'table':'sysapproval_approver','filter':'approverIN' + u.toString() + '^state=requested'});

var z = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
z.addQuery("approver", u);
z.addQuery("state", "requested");
z.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
z.setLimit(max);
z.query();

var link = {};
link.title = gs.getMessage('View all approvals');
link.type = 'link';
link.href = '?id=approvals';
link.items = [];
t.items.push(link);

while (z.next()) {
  var a = {};
  var rec = getRecordBeingApproved(z);
	if (!rec.isValidRecord())  // nothing being approved - hmmm
		continue;
	
  a.short_description = rec.short_description + "";
  if (rec.getRecordClassName() == "sc_request") {
    var items = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
    items.addQuery("request", rec.getUniqueValue());
    items.query();
    if (items.getRowCount() > 1)
      a.short_description = items.getRowCount() + " requested items";
    else if (items.getRowCount() == 1) {
      items.next();
      a.short_description = items.getValue("short_description");
    }
  }
  $sp.getRecordValues(a, z, 'sys_id,sys_updated_on');
  a.number = rec.getDisplayValue();
  a.__table = z.getRecordClassName();
  a.type = 'approval';
  t.items.push(a);
  t.count++;
}

function getRecordBeingApproved(gr) {
  if (!gr.sysapproval.nil())
    return gr.sysapproval.getRefRecord();

  return gr.document_id.getRefRecord();
}]]></record_script><sc_cat_item/><sc_category/><short_description/><sp_page/><sp_rectangle_menu display_value="SP Header Menu">d150fd31cb10020000f8d856634c9ce6</sp_rectangle_menu><sp_rectangle_menu_item/><sys_class_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-06-04 21:44:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>864aed00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d475</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Approvals</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal for Enterprise Service Management" source="com.glide.service-portal.esm">7f720688db902300840eff78bf96191c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item_864aed00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d475</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-15 15:49:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>scripted</type><url/><url_target/></sp_rectangle_menu_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=864aed00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d475"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_theme_a7a6e78277002300a6e592718a10617a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_theme"><sp_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css_variables>// Grays
$gray-base: #000000;
$gray-dark: lighten($gray-base, 18.04%);
$gray-darker: lighten($gray-base, 8.24%);
$gray-light: lighten($gray-base, 40%);
$gray-lighter: lighten($gray-base, 94.51%);
$gray: lighten($gray-base, 29.02%);

////// Branding variables //////
// should always end with !default and no other variable should have !default
$brand-primary: #1F8476 !default;
$body-bg: #ffffff !default;
$brand-success: #48C891 !default;
$state-success-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-success, 3), 15.64%), 34.31) !default;
$sp-navbar-divider-color: #5A7F71 !default;
$text-color: $gray-dark !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-color: #ffffff !default;
$navbar-inverse-bg: #293e40 !default;
$brand-warning: #DFD139 !default;
$brand-danger: #C83C36 !default;
$sp-tagline-color: #ffffff !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-color: #A7B0B2 !default;
$brand-info: #6ABECF !default;
$link-color: $brand-primary !default;
$sp-logo-margin-x: 15px !default;
$text-muted: $gray-light !default;
////////////////////////////////////

// Link hover decoration
$link-hover-decoration: underline !default;

// La Jolla variables
$dropdown-link-disabled-color: $gray-light;
$link-hover-color: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($link-color, 1), 0.42%), 16.67);
$navbar-inverse-link-active-bg: #213234;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-bg: $brand-primary;
$panel-primary-border: $brand-primary ;
$panel-primary-heading-bg: $brand-primary ;
$panel-primary-text: #ffffff;
$primary: $brand-primary;
$input-border-focus: #54AC98;
$quicklinks-background: #EDF7F5;
$btn-success-bg: $brand-success;
$btn-primary-color: #ffffff;
$btn-primary-bg: $brand-primary;
$btn-primary-border: darken($btn-primary-bg, 5%);
$btn-success-bg: $brand-success;
$btn-success-border: darken($btn-success-bg, 5%);
$btn-success-color: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-success, 3), 15.64%), 34.31);
$component-active-color: $gray;
$component-active-bg: #f5f5f5;
$state-danger-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 354), 42.52%), 42.94);
$state-danger-border: $brand-danger;
$state-danger-text: darken(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 2), 1.25%), 25.10);
$state-info-bg: lighten(desaturate($brand-info, 3.27%), 19.02);
$state-info-border: $brand-info;
$state-info-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-info, 1), 2.75%), 41.57);
$state-success-bg: lighten(saturate($brand-success, 3.67%), 28.24);
$state-success-border: $brand-success;
$state-warning-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -3), 17.70%), 29.61);
$state-warning-border: $brand-warning;
$state-warning-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -4), 20.32%), 44.31);
$alert-danger-bg: $state-danger-bg;
$alert-danger-border: $state-danger-border;
$alert-danger-text: $state-danger-text;
$alert-info-bg: $state-info-bg;
$alert-info-border: $state-info-border;
$alert-info-text: $state-info-text;
$alert-success-bg: $state-success-bg;
$alert-success-border: $state-success-border;
$alert-success-text: $state-success-text;
$alert-warning-bg: $state-warning-bg;
$alert-warning-border: $state-warning-border;
$alert-warning-text: $state-warning-text;

// To get service status messages consistent with brand colors
$primary: $brand-primary;
$warning: $brand-warning;
$success: $brand-success;
$info: $brand-info;
$danger: $brand-danger;
$input-border-placeholder: white;


// Service Catalog panel hover highlight
$panel-list-item: lighten(desaturate(adjust-hue($panel-primary-heading-bg, -6), 20.79%), 58.04);
$panel-primary-heading-bg: #47a992;

$multiple-issues-color: #7070B3;
$no-issue-color: lighten($brand-success, 40%);
$planned-maintenance-color: lighten($brand-info, 35%);
$service-degredation-color: lighten($brand-warning, 40%);
$service-outage-color: lighten($brand-danger, 45%);

$no-issue-border-color: $brand-success;
$planned-maintenance-border-color: $brand-info;
$service-degredation-border-color: $brand-warning;
$service-outage-border-color: $brand-danger;

$no-issues-text: $state-success-text;
$planned-maintenance-text: $state-info-text;
$service-degredation-text: $state-info-text;
$service-outage-text: $state-danger-bg;

$login-btn-bg: $btn-primary-bg;
$login-btn-border: $btn-primary-border;

$qa-tag-color: $state-info-text;
$qa-tag-bg: $state-info-bg;
$qa-tag-border: $state-info-bg;
$qa-tag-hover-color: darken($qa-tag-color, 10%);
$qa-tag-hover-bg: darken($qa-tag-bg, 10%);

$qa-thread-tag-color: $state-info-text;
$qa-thread-tag-bg: $state-info-bg;
$qa-thread-tag-hover-color: darken($qa-thread-tag-color, 10%);
$qa-thread-tag-hover-bg: darken($qa-thread-tag-bg, 10%);

$qa-panel-link-color: $link-color;
$select2-container-active: $input-border-focus;

$not-webkit-outline-color: $input-border-focus;
$webkit-outline-color: $input-border-focus;

$label-success-bg: lighten(saturate($brand-success, 3.67%), 28.24);
$label-info-bg: lighten(desaturate($brand-info, 3.27%), 19.02);
$label-warning-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -3), 17.70%), 29.61);
$label-danger-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 354), 42.52%), 42.94);

$data-table-selected: $brand-primary;

$button-selected-color: $btn-primary-bg;
$dropdown-link-active-bg: $brand-primary;
$dropdown-link-active-color: #ffffff;
$widget-editor-fa-bg: $brand-primary;

$input-border-tab-focus: $input-border-focus;

$fav-star-color: $brand-warning;
$fav-star-color-off: #ffffff;
$fav-star-outline-color: #6b611f;
$fav-star-outline: -1px 0 $fav-star-outline-color, 0 1px $fav-star-outline-color, 1px 0$fav-star-outline-color, 0 -1px $fav-star-outline-color;

$sc-field-error-color: #1a424b;
$qa-star-color-on: $brand-warning;
$qa-star-color-off: #ffffff;

$list-group-link-color: $brand-primary;
$list-group-hover-bg: lighten($panel-primary-heading-bg, 40%);

$accessible-placeholder-gray: #565656;
</css_variables><footer/><footer_fixed>true</footer_fixed><header display_value="Stock Header">bf5ec2f2cb10120000f8d856634c9c0c</header><name>La Jolla</name><navbar_fixed>true</navbar_fixed><sys_class_name>sp_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-22 16:34:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>a7a6e78277002300a6e592718a10617a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>81</sys_mod_count><sys_name>La Jolla</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal La Jolla Branding" source="com.glide.service-portal.themes.la-jolla">1902baf2db52bb40bd00f8ecbf96197c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_theme_a7a6e78277002300a6e592718a10617a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-07 04:19:19</sys_updated_on></sp_theme></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>spKBCategoryService</name><script><![CDATA[function() {
	var listeners = [];
	var defaultListener;
	var categoryId;
	
	function setCategoryId(catId) {
		categoryId = catId;
		if (listeners.length > 0) {
			listeners.forEach(function(fn){ fn.call(null, catId); });
			return;
		}
		
		// Call the default listener if no other listeners were set
		if (defaultListener)
			defaultListener.call(null, catId);
	}
	
	function addListener(callbackFn) {
		listeners.push(callbackFn);
		
		return function removeListener() {
			var l = listeners.indexOf(callbackFn);
			if (l > -1)
				listeners.splice(l, 1);
		};
	}
	
	function addDefaultListener(callbackFn) {
		defaultListener = callbackFn;
	}
	
	function getCategoryId() {
		return categoryId;
	}
	
	return {
		setCategoryId: setCategoryId,
		addListener: addListener,
		addDefaultListener: addDefaultListener,
		getCategoryId: getCategoryId
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-01 20:28:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>10eb7596c7033200b0b0409b9b97631c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>spKBCategoryService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Knowledge Base" source="com.glide.service-portal.knowledge-base">bba28e88db902300840eff78bf9619d6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_10eb7596c7033200b0b0409b9b97631c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-01 21:39:59</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_rectangle_menu_item_7c686d00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d4e9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rectangle_menu_item"><sp_rectangle_menu_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><color/><condition>gs.isLoggedIn()</condition><display_1/><display_2/><display_date/><filter/><glyph/><hint>My Requests</hint><kb_article/><kb_category/><kb_topic/><label>Requests</label><order>300</order><record_script><![CDATA[// maximum number of entries in this Menu
var max = 30;

var t = data;  // shortcut
t.items = [];

var u = gs.getUser().getID();

// use record watchers to tell header when to update dropdown counts
t.record_watchers = [];
t.record_watchers.push({'table':'incident','filter':'active=true^caller_id=' + u});
t.record_watchers.push({'table':'sc_request','filter':'active=true^requested_for=' + u});

var st = new GlideRecord('service_task');
if (st.isValid()) {
  t.record_watchers.push({'table':'service_task','filter':'active=true^opened_by=' + u});
  st.addActiveQuery();
  st.addQuery('opened_by', gs.getUserID());
  st.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
  st.setLimit(max);
  st.query();
  while (st.next()) {
    if (!st.canRead())
      continue;
    
    var a = {};
    $sp.getRecordValues(a, st, 'short_description,sys_id,number,sys_updated_on');
    if (st.short_description.nil())
      a.short_description = "(No description)";
    a.__table = st.getTableName();
    a.type = 'record';
    a.sortOrder = st.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
    t.items.push(a);
  }
}

var z = new GlideRecord('incident');
z.addActiveQuery();
z.addQuery('caller_id', gs.getUserID());
z.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
z.setLimit(max);
z.query();
while (z.next()) {
  if (!z.canRead())
    continue;
  
  var a = {};
  $sp.getRecordValues(a, z, 'short_description,sys_id,number,sys_updated_on');
  if (z.short_description.nil())
    a.short_description = "(No description)";
  a.__table = z.getTableName();
  a.type = 'record';
  a.sortOrder = z.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
  t.items.push(a);
}

var z = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
z.addActiveQuery();
z.addQuery('requested_for', gs.getUserID());
z.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
z.setLimit(max);
z.query();
while (z.next()) {
  if (!z.canRead())
    continue;
  
  var ritm = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
  ritm.addQuery('request', z.getUniqueValue());
  ritm.query();
  if (!ritm.next())
    continue;

  var a = {};
  $sp.getRecordValues(a, z, 'sys_id,number,sys_updated_on');
  if (ritm.hasNext()) // there are multiple items for this request
    a.short_description = ritm.getRowCount() + ' requested items';
  else if (!ritm.canRead()) // only one item, but user cannot see it
  	continue;
  else // one item, and user can see it
    a.short_description = ritm.cat_item.getDisplayValue() || ritm.getDisplayValue("short_description");
  a.__table = z.getTableName();
  a.type = 'request';
  a.sortOrder = z.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
  t.items.push(a);
}

t.items.sort(function(a, b) {
  return b.sortOrder - a.sortOrder;
});
t.items = t.items.slice(0, max); // only want first 30
t.count = t.items.length;

var link = {title: gs.getMessage('View all requests'), type: 'link', href: '?id=requests', items: []};
t.items.unshift(link); // put 'View all requests' first]]></record_script><sc_cat_item/><sc_category/><short_description/><sp_page/><sp_rectangle_menu display_value="SP Header Menu">d150fd31cb10020000f8d856634c9ce6</sp_rectangle_menu><sp_rectangle_menu_item/><sys_class_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-06-04 21:36:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>7c686d00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d4e9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>55</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal for Enterprise Service Management" source="com.glide.service-portal.esm">7f720688db902300840eff78bf96191c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item_7c686d00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d4e9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-11 19:24:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>scripted</type><url/><url_target/></sp_rectangle_menu_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7c686d00d7200200a9ad1e173e24d4e9"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: standard.navbar { transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; border: 0; border-bottom: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; } .navbar-fade { opacity: 0.4; } .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle { border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); } header[role="banner"], .nav > li > a { max-height: 60px; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px){ .nav > li > a { padding-right: 0.5rem; padding-left: 0.5rem; } } .navbar-brand { max-height: 60px; padding: 0; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; } .navbar-brand img, .navbar-brand span { margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-top: $sp-logo-margin-y; margin-bottom: $sp-logo-margin-y; display: block; max-height: $sp-logo-max-height; max-width: $sp-logo-max-width; position: relative; top: 50%; -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%); -ms-transform: translateY(-50%); transform: translateY(-50%); } .breadcrumb-container { background-color: $panel-bg; } /* for mobile app */ .navbar-inverse.is-native { background-color: #405060; } nav { margin-bottom: 0px; border-radius: 0px; .toggle-dropdown { height: 60px; } } .navbar-right { padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 7px; } .navbar-nav { margin: 0px; } // PRB711244: Dropdown menu is scrollable when too many items .scrollable-dropdown { max-height: 80vh; overflow: auto; height: auto; } .is-native { .scrollable-dropdown { max-height: 100vh; overflow: scroll; height: auto; } } /* PRB923910: Fix for Service Portal - Header Poorly Aligned in Safari */ @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { .navbar-right { display: flex !important; } }sp_instancefalsefalse 0) $(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse'); }); }]]>Stock Headertruetruesp_header_footeradmin2015-12-16 23:21:34bf5ec2f2cb10120000f8d856634c9c0c549Stock Header37720688db902300840eff78bf96191dglobalsp_header_footer_bf5ec2f2cb10120000f8d856634c9c0cadmin2018-10-01 19:09:13

sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_6412ffc277002300a6e592718a1061ec
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.select2-results .select2-highlighted,
.selectize-dropdown .selectize-dropdown-content .active,
ul.dropdown-menu li a:hover {
  background-color: $btn-primary-bg !important;
  color: $input-border-placeholder !important;
  
  span.text-muted {
    color: $input-border-placeholder;
  }
  
  .badge {
    color: $input-border-placeholder;
    border-color: $input-border-placeholder;
    background-color: $btn-primary-bg;
  }
}

// For Service Catalog old categories
.panel-default .list-group-item .group-item-primary .badge {
    color: $input-border-placeholder;
    border-color: $input-border-placeholder;
    background-color: $btn-primary-bg;
}

.select2-container-active .select2-choice,
.select2-container-active .select2-choices {
  border-color: $input-border-focus !important;
}

div.sp-page-root .category-widget .category-list 
  .group-item {
	&:focus, &:active {
      border: none;
      outline: none !important;
    }
  }
  
  .group-item-default {
      &:hover, &:focus {
        background-color: #d1ebe5 !important;
        border-left-color: #d1ebe5 !important;
      }
  }

  .list-bg, .list-bg-primary, .list-bg-default  {
    background-color: $panel-list-item !important;
    border-left-color: $panel-list-item !important;
  }
}

.btn[name="approve"] {
  background-color: $btn-success-bg;
  color: $btn-success-color;
  border-color: $btn-success-border;

  &:hover {
    background-color: darken($btn-success-bg, 5%);
  }
}

input:focus {
  outline-color: $brand-primary !important;
}

.selectize-input.focus {
  border-color: $input-border-focus !important;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.075), 0 0 8px $input-border-focus !important;
}

.selectize-control.multi .selectize-input.items .item.active {
  background-color: $brand-primary;
}

.panel-default .panel-heading, .panel-heading.panel-la-jolla-default {
  background-color: $component-active-bg;
  color: $component-active-color;
  border-color: $sp-b-border-color;
}

.btn[disabled], .btn.disabled {
	opacity: .25;
}

.bootstrap-datetimepicker-widget .active {
  background-color: $brand-primary !important;
}

.slider-track .slider-handle {
  background-color: $brand-primary;
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, lighten($brand-primary, 5%) 0, $brand-primary 100%);
}

.bootstrap-datetimepicker-widget td.today:before {
  border-bottom-color: $brand-primary;
}

a.list-group-item {
  &.active,
  &.active:hover,
  &.active:focus {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-color: #dddddd;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
}

[accessibility="true"] {
  div.sp-page-root, div.modal, div.bootstrap-datetimepicker-widget { // need to put container element in selector to override default highlighting
    a:focus,
    [role="slider"]:focus,
    [role="button"]:focus,
    [tabindex="0"]:focus,
    input:focus,
    .btn:focus,
    select:focus,
    .selectize-input.focus {
      outline: 4px solid $input-border-focus !important; /* IE */
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px $input-border-focus;
      outline: 4px solid $input-border-focus !important; /* FF */
      outline: 5px auto $input-border-focus !important; // WebKit Chrome
      outline-offset: -2px;
    }
    
    .selectize-input.items input {
      outline: none !important;
      box-shadow: none !important;
    }
  }
  
  .select2-search input:focus {
  	outline-color: $input-border-focus !important;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px $input-border-focus !important;
  }
}</css><name>sp-theme-la-jolla.css</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-22 17:22:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>6412ffc277002300a6e592718a1061ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>135</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sp-theme-la-jolla.css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal La Jolla Branding" source="com.glide.service-portal.themes.la-jolla">1902baf2db52bb40bd00f8ecbf96197c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_6412ffc277002300a6e592718a1061ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-30 19:10:54</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_27b1bbc277002300a6e592718a106137
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.label {
  font-weight: normal !important;
  font-size: 12px !important;
}

[accessibility="true"] {
  a {
    &:hover {
      text-decoration: underline !important;
    }
    &:focus {
      text-decoration: underline !important;
    }
  }
  .sp-announcement-root {
    a {
      text-decoration: underline !important;
    }
  }
  [uib-rating] {
    .glyphicon-star {
      color: black !important;
    }
  }
  input::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: $accessible-placeholder-gray !important;
  }
  input::-moz-placeholder {
    color: $accessible-placeholder-gray !important;
  }
  input:-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: $accessible-placeholder-gray !important;
  }
}

button:focus {
  outline: none;
  border: 1px solid $input-border-focus;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px $input-border-focus;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px $input-border-focus;
}

[tabindex]:focus {
  outline: none;
  border: 1px solid $input-border-focus;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px $input-border-focus;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px $input-border-focus;
}

.navbar-nav {
  .open {
    a {
      .label {
        background-color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
        color: $brand-primary;
      }
    }
  }
  li {
    a:hover, a:focus {
      .label {
        background-color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
        color: $brand-primary;
      }
    }
  }
}

.panel-primary {
  .label {
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
    border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
    color: #2E2E2E;
  }
}

.breadcrumbs-container {
  background-color: #f0f3f4 !important;
}

.timeline-badge {
  &.success {
    background-color: $brand-success !important;
  }
}

.select2-results {
  .select2-highlighted {
    background: $brand-primary !important;
  }
}

.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  color: #4c4c4c !important;
}

.help-block {
  color: #545454 !important;
}

.selected {
  background-color: #707070;
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu>li>a {
    .text-muted {
      color: $navbar-inverse-link-color !important;
    }
  }
}

// Panel footer is a light gray background, so text color should be dark.
.panel-footer {
  color: #515151 !important;
}
</css><name>sp-theme-stock-high-contrast.css</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-22 17:20:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>27b1bbc277002300a6e592718a106137</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sp-theme-stock-high-contrast.css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal La Jolla Branding" source="com.glide.service-portal.themes.la-jolla">1902baf2db52bb40bd00f8ecbf96197c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_27b1bbc277002300a6e592718a106137</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-08 22:37:30</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

// Get the information for finger #1 touchX=touch.pageX-touch.target.offsetLeft; touchY=touch.pageY-touch.target.offsetTop; } } } function collisionDetection() { for(c=0; c b.x && x < b.x+brickWidth && y > b.y && y < b.y+brickHeight) { dy = -dy; b.status = 0; score++; if(score == maxPoints) { gameover = true; drawMessage("You Win"); } } } } } } function drawBall() { ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(x, y, ballRadius, 0, Math.PI*2); ctx.fillStyle = color2; ctx.fill(); ctx.closePath(); } function drawPaddle() { ctx.beginPath(); ctx.rect(paddleX, canvas.height-paddleHeight, paddleWidth, paddleHeight); ctx.fillStyle = color; ctx.fill(); ctx.closePath(); } function drawBricks() { maxPoints = 0; for(c=0; c -1); return false; } function drawScore() { ctx.font = "16px Arial"; ctx.fillStyle = color; ctx.fillText("Score: "+score, 8, 20); } function drawLives() { ctx.font = "16px Arial"; ctx.fillStyle = color ctx.fillText("Lives: "+lives, canvas.width-65, 20); } function drawMessage(text) { var loc = (canvas.width)/2; ctx.textAlign="center"; ctx.font = "24px Arial"; ctx.fillStyle = color2; ctx.fillText(text, loc, 150); } function draw() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); drawBricks(); drawBall(); drawPaddle(); drawScore(); drawLives(); collisionDetection(); if (x + dx > canvas.width-ballRadius || x + dx < ballRadius) dx = -dx; if (y + dy < ballRadius) dy = -dy; else if(y + dy > canvas.height-ballRadius) { if(x > paddleX && x < paddleX + paddleWidth) dy = -dy; else { lives--; if(!lives) { gameover = true; drawMessage("Game Over"); } else { x = canvas.width/2; y = canvas.height-30; dx = 3; dy = -3; paddleX = (canvas.width-paddleWidth)/2; } } } if(rightPressed && paddleX < canvas.width-paddleWidth) paddleX += 7; else if(leftPressed && paddleX > 0) paddleX -= 7; x += dx; y += dy; if (gameover==false) requestAnimationFrame(draw); } draw(); }]]>Breakout Gametrue

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_instance"><sp_instance action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><color>default</color><css>.empty-state-content {
  background-color: rgba(58, 63, 81, 0.7);
  color: $gray-light;
}

.list-group-item {
  background-color: rgba(58, 63, 81, 0.7);
  border: 0px solid transparent;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.60);
}

.list-group-item:last-child {
  border: 0px solid transparent;
}

.panel-heading {
  background-color: rgba(138, 143, 160, 0.6);
  border-bottom: 0px solid transparent;
  color: #fff;
}

.panel {
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  background: none;
}

.panel-footer {
  display: none;
}

a {
color: #fff;
}

.text-muted {
  color: #fff;
}</css><glyph/><id/><order>1</order><roles/><short_description/><size>md</size><sp_column display_value="2">728958d7cb31120000f8d856634c9cee</sp_column><sp_widget display_value="Popular Questions">e0c3a791d721120023c84f80de610304</sp_widget><sys_class_name>sp_instance</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-01 19:37:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>40f3b89bcb31120000f8d856634c9c32</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">37720688db902300840eff78bf96191d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_instance_40f3b89bcb31120000f8d856634c9c32</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-02 22:26:45</sys_updated_on><title/><url/><widget_parameters/></sp_instance><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=40f3b89bcb31120000f8d856634c9c32"/></record_update>
